basic.description: This course examines principles of effective merchandising management through mathematical procedures.
basic.subject: CTE
basic.title: Quantitative Merchandising Management

extra.enrollment_requirement: Prerequisites: A 2.0 GPA as well as a grade of "C" or better in ACG 2021, CTE 3806, ECO 2013, ECO 2023, MGF 1106, MGF 1107, and MAC 1105.
